messages.subject: Late Introduction
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I ve been reading all the posts and am truly inspired to unschool now more than ever.  My name is Theresa and my son s name is Bowie(as in David Bowie).
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

I've been reading all the posts and am truly inspired to unschool now more than ever. My name is Theresa and my son's name is Bowie(as in David Bowie). I first started looking into attachment parenting when my son was about 4 months old and have been reading and researching ever since. I am the only one in my family who practices most forms of attachment parenting. Right now I am working on deschooling myself. My son isn't exactly school age yet. He's 15 months old, but I am trying to find out as much as I can and really figure out which type of homeschooling I'd like to do or combine. I'm really happy to have found this group because it's really nice to listen to others who are living an unschooling life. I'm here mostly to be inspired. I first only thought of homeschooling. I didn't even think that I was allowed to unschool my son. I am really loving the idea of unschooling, but I am a single mom and I was wondering if many single parents choose to unschool. If you/they do what to you/they do that makes everything work together?

Thank You,
Theresa
